name: Run From Her
description:
Atmospheric game, where you must escape from her. She is hunting you, trying broke your life and kill you. Location is abandonned fabric, all eployees killed by her, but you survived. Survive again!

Ingame settings: Graphic, Language.

Game supports Russian and English languages. Sound can be loud, turn down it in Volume mixer.

Archive size: 2GB.

Game size: 4GB.
